text: My mom brought me up to believe that my talent is a gift and a blessing.
author: Christina Aguilera

text: Thankfully, I have my mom and a small group of close friends who are there for me 24/7 and whom I can trust and depend on.
author: Christina Aguilera

text: I remember watching the Grammys and looking at the performances and crying to my mom, saying how much I wanted to be there.
author: Christina Aguilera

text: I always wanted to be a mom.
author: Heidi Klum

text: When I was younger, I had a perm, and it was really big. My mom was a hairdresser, so even my dad had a perm! I looked like a poodle, but it was cool at the time.
author: Heidi Klum
